snippet: Aberdeen, the last team other than Celtic or Rangers to win Scotland's Premier League title, is planning to leave Pittodrie Stadium.
abstract: Aberdeen, the last team other than Celtic or Rangers to win Scotland's Premier League title, is planning to leave Pittodrie Stadium.
lead_paragraph: Aberdeen's Pittodrie Stadium has a long history of pioneering. Among its boasts, it was the first soccer stadium in the world to feature a dugout and it was the first all-seat stadium in Britain.

headline.main: Aberdeen Looks to New Stadium to Reignite Old Firm Challenge
